Sentence.value: - Never hand a sharp object to someone else or put it on a tray for another person to pick up.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: - Never hand a sharp object to someone else or put it on a [[tray|C0184054]] for another [[person|C0027361]] to pick up.

Sentence.value: - Sharps containers should be at eye level and within your reach.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: - [[Sharps containers|C0493886]] should be at [[eye|C0015392]] level and within your reach.

Sentence.value: Or, a trained person may use tongs to push the needle back into the container.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Or, a trained [[person|C0027361]] may use [[tongs|C0183964]] to push the needle back into the container.
